bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Pad-Mounted Equipment--Enclosure Integrity for Coastal Environments
IEEE Standard for Pad-Mounted Equipment--Enclosure Integrity for Coastal Environments
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.29-2014 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.29-2005)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Conformance tests and requirements for the integrity of above-grade pad-mounted enclosures for application in coastal environments that contain apparatus energized in excess of 600 V and that may be exposed to the public are described. These include, but are not limited to,the following types of equipment enclosures: pad-mounted capacitors or inductors, pad-mounted distribution transformers, pad-mounted junction enclosures, pad-mounted metering equipment, pad-mounted switchgear, and pad-mounted voltage regulators.

Conformance tests and requirements for the integrity of above-grade pad-mounted enclosures for application in coastal environments that contain apparatus energized in excess of 600 V and that may be exposed to the public are described. These include, but are not limited to, the following types of equipment enclosures: pad-mounted capacitors or inductors, pad-mounted distribution transformers, pad-mounted junction enclosures, pad-mounted metering equipment, pad-mounted switchgear, and pad-mounted voltage regulators.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
